definitions.title: vb. be smooth, straight, right
definitions.body: (NH id., and deriv.; Ar. yasara be gentle, tractable easy, II. make easy; yasarun manageable, easy, but Sab. [[ותַר]], [[הותַר]], [[אהל יתַרן]] Os:ZMG 1865, 270 CIS:iv, 29, 2; As. Išâu, be or go straight, right, mêšêru, justice, mêšêriš, righteously, Dl:HWB 310)—

fig., be pleasing, agreeable, right ([[בְּעֵינֵי]] in the yees of); said of a woman Ju Jdg 14:3, Jdg 14:7; a man Je 27:5; of matters and things ([[הַדָּבָר]]) 1Sa 18:20, 1Sa 18:26, 2Sa 17:4, 1Ch 13:4, 2Ch 30:4; of cities 1Ki 9:12; a place [[בְּעֵינֵי הָאֱלֽהִים]] Nu 23:27 (E); with [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] Je 18:4.
in ethical sense, straightforward, upright; [[יׇֽשְׁרָה נַפְשׁוֹ בּוֹ]] Hb Hab 2:4 his soul is not upright in him (opp. [[עֻפְּלָה]] swollen).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 ´[[יִשָָּׁרְתִּ]] Ps 119:128 ([[יִשְׁרֵהוּ]] Job 37:3, 3 m. sf. Thes; but < Ew Di Hi De Da, Impf. fr. [[שָׁרָה]]); Impf. [[יְיַשֵּׁר]] Pr 3:6; [[יְיַשֶּׁר־]] Pr 15:21; sf. [[וַיְיַשְּׁרֵם]] (Mas. abbrev. [[וַיַּשְּׁרֵם]]) 2Ch 32:30; 3 fs. [[תְּיַשֵּׁר]] Pr 11:4; 1 S. [[אֲיַשֵּׁר]] Is 45:13; [[אֲיַשֵּׁר]] v:Is 45:2 Qr (Kt Hiph. [[אוֹשִׁר]] Ges:§ 70, 2 doubtless copyist's error); Imv. pl. [[יַשְּׁרוּ]] Is 40:3; Pt. pl. [[מְיַשְּׁרִים]] Pr 9:15; —

make smooth, straight, acc. [[מְסִלָּה]] Is 40:3; [[הֲדוּרִים]] Is 45:2; fig., with [[דֶּרֶח]] make smooth or straight, i.e. free from obstacles, successful v:Is 45:13, Pr 11:5, [[אׂרַח]] Pr 3:5; in ethical sense, [[הַמְיַשְּׁרִים אָרְחוֹתָם]] Pr 9:15 those making straight their paths, going straightforward on their paths; [[יְיַשֶּׁר־לָָכֶת]] Pr 15:21 maketh straight his going, goeth straightforwards.
lead straight along direct, waters of an aqueduct 2Ch 32:30; (of the thunder Job 37:3 acc. to some; but v. rather [[שָׁרָה]])
esteem right, approve Ps 119:128 (rd. [[כל פקודיך לי יִשָָּׁרְתִּי]]).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[זׇהָב מְיֻשָּׁר]] 1Ki 6:35 gold made level, laid smoothly out, upon the graven work.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 pl. [[עַפְעַפֶּיךָ יַיְשִׁרוּ נֶגְדְֶָּ]] Pr 4:25 let thine eyelids look straight before thee; Imv. [[הַיְ֠שַׁר דַּרְכְֶּ]] make thy way even Ps 5:9 Qr (Kt [[הוֹשַׁר]]; v. Ges:70 (2)).
